translations.The document is not certified; edits and: The document is not certified; edits and new signatures are allowed, but any change will mark previous signatures as modified.

translations.After the first signature, only form fil: After the first signature, only form filling and additional signatures are allowed; other changes invalidate the certification.
translations.After the first signature, form filling,: After the first signature, form filling, comments, and additional signatures are allowed; other changes invalidate the certification.

translations.‚úçÔ∏è Self-hosted document signer using: ‚úçÔ∏è Self-hosted document signer using digital certificate
translations.**This is a libre digital PDF signature:
**This is a libre digital PDF signature app for Nextcloud**

* ‚úçÔ∏è **Sign PDF** documents using digital certificates
* üîÑ **Hybrid signatures**: You can choose between personal or system-generated digital certificates
* üë• **Multiple signers**: Request signature on a document for as many people as you need
* üì∏ **QR Code**: Document validation by QR Code
* üîí **Privacy**: Fully self-hosted document signer
* üì≤ **Connect to your software**: Easily integrate [LibreSign](https://libresign.coop) into your service with our full-fledged [REST-API](https://libresign.coop/posts/libresign-api-guide/).
* üôã **Get involved**! We have lots of stuff planned. More information at [LibreSign](https://github.com/libresign/libresign) repository.

üåç Help us translate this application on [Transifex](https://app.transifex.com/nextcloud/nextcloud/libresign/)

If you enjoy this app and want to help maintain its development or want enterprise support, please contact us:

[https://libresign.coop](https://libresign.coop)

## Donation

Developed with ‚ù§Ô∏è by [LibreCode](https://librecode.coop). Help us transform people and businesses through cooperativism.

* [Donate with GitHub Sponsor: ![Donate using GitHub Sponsor](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=Sponsor&message=%E2%9D%A4&logo=GitHub&color=%23fe8e86)](https://github.com/sponsors/libresign)

translations.Your password must be greater than 4 dig: Your password must be greater than 4 digits

translations.Error creating new password, please cont: Error creating new password, please contact the administrator

translations.An error occurred while revoking the cer: An error occurred while revoking the certificate
translations.There are no certificate revocation list: There are no certificate revocation list entries to display.
translations.You are about to revoke a {type} CERTIFI: You are about to revoke a {type} CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY. This is a critical operation that may invalidate certificates issued by this CA.
translations.Are you absolutely sure you want to proc: Are you absolutely sure you want to proceed?
translations.This action cannot be undone. The certif: This action cannot be undone. The certificate will be permanently revoked.
translations.WARNING: This is a CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY: WARNING: This is a CERTIFICATE AUTHORITY! Revoking it will affect the certificate chain and may invalidate certificates issued by this CA.

translations.List of files. Column headers with butto: List of files. Column headers with buttons are sortable.

translations.I will not use root certificate: I will not use root certificate
translations.Enabling this feature, every time a docu: Enabling this feature, every time a document is signed, LibreSign will store the IP address and user agent of the signer.
translations.Collect signers' metadata when signing a: Collect signers' metadata when signing a document
translations.Name of the folder that will contain the: Name of the folder that will contain the user's digital certificate, visible signature images, and other files related to LibreSign.
translations.DocMDP defines what types of changes are: DocMDP defines what types of changes are allowed in a PDF after it is signed, ensuring viewers can detect unauthorized modifications.
translations.Default certification level for new sign: Default certification level for new signatures:
translations.Binaries required to work. Download size: Binaries required to work. Download size could be nearly {size}, please wait a moment.
translations.Rules for controlling the expiration of: Rules for controlling the expiration of a request to sign a file.
translations.Maximum validity in seconds of a request: Maximum validity in seconds of a request to sign.
translations.Renewal interval in seconds of a subscri: Renewal interval in seconds of a subscription request. When accessing the link, you will be asked to renew the link.
translations.The length of time for which the generat: The length of time for which the generated certificate will be valid, in days.
translations.The flow of identification documents wil: The flow of identification documents will make it mandatory for anyone who must sign a file, to send their identification documents, this, in order for them to be approved by some member of the approval group. The user can only create the certificate after these are approved.
translations.Select authorized groups that can reques: Select authorized groups that can request to sign documents. Admin group is the default group and doesn't need to be defined.
translations.Ways to identify a person who will sign: Ways to identify a person who will sign a document.
translations.Request to create account when the user: Request to create account when the user does not have an account
translations.This information will appear on the vali: This information will appear on the validation page
translations.Follow up with automatic reminders. Sign: Follow up with automatic reminders. Signers will receive reminders until they sign or decline.
translations.The first message is not considered a no: The first message is not considered a notification
Zero or empty is no reminder.
translations.To generate new signatures, you must fir: To generate new signatures, you must first generate the root certificate.
translations.Regenerate root certificate will invalid: Regenerate root certificate will invalidate all signatures keys. Do you confirm this action?
translations.Full name of the main company or main us: Full name of the main company or main user of this instance
translations.Not mandatory, leave blank to use the de: Not mandatory, leave blank to use the default value.
translations.All signers receive the document at the: All signers receive the document at the same time and can sign in any order.
translations.Signers are organized by signing order n: Signers are organized by signing order number. Only those with the lowest pending order number can sign.
translations.Configure the content displayed with the: Configure the content displayed with the signature. The text template uses Twig syntax: https://twig.symfony.com/
translations.Signature template content is overflowin: Signature template content is overflowing. Reduce the text.
translations.If no background image or signature temp: If no background image or signature template is provided, no visible signature will be added to the document.
